title: Do You Know Who's A Digital Nomad? - Quora

response.answer_text: I have been in IT industry for last 5 years and worked in several IT firms. And, I have met more than dozens of people who are Freelancing and have their own firms. Since you are more curious about Digital Nomad, I have met a few people who are Serious Digital Nomad who travels in India as well as overseas and work across the globe. Being a Digital Nomad is an interesting work where you can Travel and Work simultaneously. But is it worth it for everyone? Let’s find out. 1. You have to know about yourself before you jump into nomad thing because you would be alone working for someone and only you can decide the Good and Bad for your self. 2. You need to develop extremely disciplined characteristics. 3. Read as much as you can about almost every subject. 4. Having a grasp at multiple languages is an advantage. 5. Be excellent at what you do and be ready to experiment where most people will give up. 6. Being at a different location should not affect your work in any way otherwise you better stay at the office and complete the work. 7. Be disciplined towards your goal, do not procrastinate. There are many things you need to take care of before getting into the journey of Digital Nomad.

I am a digital nomad. I have no home address, I work online and I travel from place to place. So that makes me a digital nomad. I meet others, some say they are digital nomads, but they still own homes and travel home, or they do not really work online. But I am a true digital nomad.
